name: Berry Herbal Candy
description: A Nod-Krai candy made from local flowers, herbs, and berries. Its bright colors bring a small but welcome touch of sweetness to the vast frozen plains.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Berry Herbal Candy
suspicious.description: A Nod-Krai candy. Salty and astringent in a way you wouldn't expect from a candy, it hits so hard that anyone anticipating something sweet would howl in shock and dismay.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Max HP by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Berry Herbal Candy
normal.description: A Nod-Krai candy made from local flowers, herbs, and berries. Its bright colors bring a small but welcome touch of sweetness to the vast frozen plains.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Max HP by 22% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Berry Herbal Candy
delicious.description: A Nod-Krai candy. The moment this translucent treat touches your tongue, waves of floral fragrance and sweet-tart berries fill your senses, fresh and delightfully sweet.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Max HP by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

special.name: Moonlit Mirage
special.description: Columbina's specialty. The translucent candy looks like droplets of dew gathered from moonlight. Its delicate sweetness flits in and out of reach, as if luring you into a beautiful, fleeting dream. You can't help but wonder at the skill and care that went into making it...
special.effect: Increases all party members' Max HP by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
